import React from 'react'; const WTRead =({ReadsData, changeMove, moveItem})=> { return (

Want to Read

{ReadsData.lenght !== 0 ?
    {ReadsData.map((wData,windex)=>(
  1. {wData.title}
    {wData.author}
    2.  ))}
: // The below paragraph is to be printed if no data in a category

No data. Just move some books in this category {ReadsData.length}

}
); } export default WTRead;
